Content: EPIC GAMERS! NLwe have an annoucement to make!NLNLUnited for Zealous Gaming (UZG) is recruiting and doing tryoutsNLif you are interested message me! (UZG Halcyon)NLNLRequirements:NLblack_circle️ Have 6+ kd. Im joking_ have a 1+ kdNLblack_circle️ 50 wins at leastNLblack_circle️ Be active (spend at least 1 hour a day with the team)NLblack_circle️ A good team requires good communication_ thereforeNLit is required for you to have a mic and speak understandable english.NLNLblack_circle️ PC and Console only (few exceptions could be made)NLblack_circle️ NA-West_ Na-East_ and EuropeNLNL<:battlepass:394979262655889418> Other things you might be interested in:NLwe have a rank system and you will be given a rank based on howNLgood you play on public matches.NLNLWe have the following ranks:NL➤ BronzeNL➤ SilverNL➤ GoldNL➤ Onyx NL➤ DiamondNLNL<:FN:332199960139530240> Finally but not least:NLwe accept not so good players that would love to improve their skils.NLNL"Be Zealous" -UZG Halcyon
